project_title: Improve the Quality of CA Reviews
project_context: The competitive nature of Catalyst is impacting the quality of CA reviews.
The Catalyst QA stage changes every Fund according to the will of the community. Time and energy is needed to keep it up-to-date.
There are barriers, such as a lack of trusted information to voting caused by language differences & cultural exclusivity.
It's difficult to gauge the wisdom of the crowd in advance of major events.
Voter's access to information about proposals and assessments is limited and not presented in a user-friendly way.
Voting paradigms in DLT are not built select prime solutions by optimal behavior coordination between self-interested individuals.
Catalyst is constantly changing and evolving. Without maintenance and updates, useful Community Tools will become outdated and useless.
Catalyst already generates lots of data (voting results, advisors scores...) that are not being used to bring value to the process.
Community members have no way to be rewarded for contributing stories of their Catalyst journeys, and voting on the contributions of others
Rewarding intangible work in a DAO is not transparent or scalable. There is too much focus on $ allocation before contribution attribution.
Discussions regarding the future of Cardano & Catalyst are spread around many platforms and are disconnected from the voting process.
Placeholder
It's becoming harder to vote on the many proposals. Let's provide an easy mechanism for users to vote quickly based on their interests.
It is becoming apparent that it is too difficult or even impossible for the average voter to make a good projects selection for voting.
Blockchain DAOs, including Catalyst, are governed by one coin - one vote policy which is susceptible to oligarchic control.
Every round it seems one or two proposals do not get funded by relatively small margins because of the current voting cut off system
